DOC.brief_summary: An in situ model will be used to evaluate and compare enamel remineralization of human enamel specimens after single use of experimental children's toothpastes.
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Study to Evaluate Experimental Children's Toothpastes in an In-Situ Caries Model
DOC.criteria: Healthy males and females aged 11 to 14 inclusive who have an unstimulated salivary flow rate of at least 0.2 mL/minute and a stimulated salivary flow rate of at least 0.8 mL/minute (Screening Visit 1).
